section.p: provides one convenient access point to your monitoring data. Use Monitoring > Overview to keep track of your services and servers and quickly check their status. The overview also indicates any irregularities in the log data of the system components your are monitoring.
On the Overview page, you can:

li.p: Access preconfigured dashboards that visualize your metrics data. Use the Dashboard option and the Monasca Health option at the top border of the Overview page for this purpose. Starting from these preconfigured dashboards, you can create your own dashboards for visualizing your monitoring data as required. For details, refer to .

Access a preconfigured dashboard that visualizes your log data. Use the Log Management option at the top border of the Overview page for this purpose. Starting from this preconfigured default dashboard, you can create your own dashboards for visualizing your log data as required. For details, refer to .

View the status of your services, servers, and log data at a glance. As soon as you have defined an alarm for a service, a server, or log data, there is status information displayed on the Overview page. For details on defining alarms, refer to . For details on the status information, refer to .
